content: आयम् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To extend, lengthen out, stretch out; वस्त्रं-पाणिंआयच्छते <ls>Sk.</ls>; स्वांगमायच्छमानः <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; आयच्छति कूपाद्रज्जुं <ls>Sk.</ls> draws up; बाणमुद्यतमायसीत् <ls>Bk. 6. 119</ls> stretched out. {@--2@} To restrain, draw in (as breath &c.); <ls>Ms. 3. 217</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 100</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 24.</ls> {@--3@} To stretch oneself, to grow long (<ab>Atm.</ab>); <ls>P. I. 3. 28.</ls> {@--4@} To grasp, possess; <ls>Bk. 8. 46.</ls> {@--5@} To bring or lead towards. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To lengthen, stretch, spread or draw out. {@--2@} To remove, transplant.
